p: Patrick D. Hoek et al. ( 15) through a clinical trial, highlighted the most problematic aspects in the application of teleconsultation, showing how it is necessary to seek ways of optimizing multidisciplinary care done through teleconsultation, making the times and frequency of teleconsultations more suitable for patients with advanced cancer, underlining the need of doing research in this area for improving of the most critical aspects of telemedicine ( 15).
